Poetic Translation: O strength of Wisdom Beyond Time,
who, in making circles, circled all,

Direct Translation: See translation at Choral Public Domain Library.

Lyrics: in una via, quae habet vitam,
Poetic Translation: in just one pathway, all life conferring,
One wing soars to the highest heavens,
and one distills on earth its essence;

Lyrics: Laus tibi sit, sicut te decet,
Poetic Translation: All praise to You, just as is fitting,
